summary: After the Civil War, ex-Confederate officer returns home where he gets embroiled in local feuds involving an unscrupulous strongman and his hired henchmen.
cast: Giuliano Gemma|Evelyn Stewart|Pierre Cressoy|Giuseppe Addobbati|Franco Fantasia|Tullio Altamura|Massimo Righi|Andrea Scotti|Nazzareno Zamperla|Benito Stefanelli|Franco Lantieri|Gino Marturano|Nello Pazzafini|Bernard Farber|Luigi Tosi|Alfredo Rizzo|Fortunato Arena|Bruno Ariè|Pietro Ceccarelli|Giulio Maculani|Osiride Pevarello|Gaetano Scala|Ignazio Spalla|Sal Borgese|Jeff Cameron|Tony Casale|Alfonso Giganti|Nicola Palumbo|Mario Pennisi|Riccardo Pizzuti|Valerio Tordi
keywords: two gun holster|gun|gun holster|holster|double gun holster
director: Director: Giorgio Ferroni (as Calvin Jackson Padget)
title: Un dólar agujereado
